Description:
You will also ensure that you:Are familiar with a variety of the leasing field's concepts, practices, and procedures.
Have experience of drafting, reviewing and preparing legal documents and letters
Some knowledge of working with Yardi and/or other Leasing systems
Consistently apply your experience and judgement to plan and accomplish goals.
Effectively direct the work of others, specifically supporting departments.
Understand the principles of budgeting and forecasting for super regional malls/retail assets  Job Details
